subjectline.content: You’ve got challenges, we’ve got answers.

html.content:
To view this email as a web page, click here.
Hi [FirstName],

Thanks for reaching out to Shell Polymers!

Defining what your customers need is a moving target that changes over time. That's one reason we spent hours interviewing PE converters, identifying their challenges, and creating related solutions. A common challenge our interviews uncovered was that converters are having difficulty keeping up with industry changes regarding sustainability.

Changing buyer preferences are creating opportunities for plastics companies that innovate toward a circular economy. Our complimentary eBook takes a deep dive into helping brand owners meet their packaging sustainability goals by creating high-quality, lightweight products in a sustainable manner that use less raw material and energy to make and ship.
Download Our eBook
That's just the start of our role as your resource. Our team will be available for our clients if they need to get in touch, and when they need us most. Our account managers and customer service teams will be there to provide 1:1 support that allows for tailored responses that help you meet your business goals.

Schedule a call with an account team member today to see what an unrivaled customer experience can do for your business.
Stay In-the-Know
Get the latest news on the PE industry as well as expert tips on removing supply chain obstacles.
Follow Us on LinkedIn

subjectline.content: Your PE Supply Just Got A Confidence Boost

preheader.content: Our plant provides a convenient location, supply chain modality, and more.

html.content:
To view this email as a web page, click here.
Hi [FirstName],

We want to help customers reduce surprises around supply and demand and keep them in the know when it comes to their product. One way we hope to keep converters competitive is with our state-of-the-art polyethylene plant in Monaca, Pennsylvania, which has been built with reliability in mind.
See Where PE Is Headed
Our new plant is built from the ground up to stay efficient in ever-changing working conditions, and features:
■ Industry 4.0 solutions like sensors and automation that will provide transparency.
 
■ Simulation technology that will have employees ready for the first day of operations.
 
■ And Polymer Pioneers and Pros whose expertise supports customers.
The Shell Polymers team is prepared to help clients when and where they need it the most. Schedule a call with an account team member today to begin the journey towards an unrivaled customer experience.
Stay In-the-Know
Get the latest news on the PE industry as well as expert tips on removing supply chain obstacles.
Follow Us on LinkedIn
 |  Privacy Policy  |  Terms and Conditions

subjectline.content: We’re so glad to hear from you! 👋

html.content:
To view this email as a web page, click here.
Hi [FirstName],

Thanks for reaching out to Shell Polymers!

We strive to be more than a resource to answer your questions; we also want to point you to and prepare you for new opportunities. This free case scenario highlights opportunities for entering new markets in blown film, and Shell Polymers' ability to host polyethylene trials that allow our customers to test new products with minimal downtime at their plants. That's among the many ways our plant is designed to overcome common implementation challenges and Break the Mold in how converters and suppliers do business.
Download Our Case Scenario
That's not all. From the applications hall that gives access to industry-scale conversion equipment to the analytical labs where our polymer scientists are troubleshooting and fingerprinting resin to ensure a higher level of consistency, we have the tools and team that give you a competitive edge.

Schedule a call with an account team member today to begin your journey towards an unrivaled customer experience.
Stay In-the-Know
Get the latest news on the PE industry as well as expert tips on removing supply chain obstacles.
Follow Us on LinkedIn
 |  Privacy Policy  |  Terms and Conditions

subjectline.content: Collaborate with technical experts 🧠 in our Innovation Center

preheader.content: Focus on growing your business with our Innovation Center

html.content:
To view this email as a web page, click here.
Hi [FirstName],

Growing your business requires growing your knowledge. That's where our technical experts and polymer scientists can empower converters. Our team will be based at our plant's on-site innovation center, where converters can tap into their long careers in polyethylene and glean up-to-date knowledge to troubleshoot today's production challenges today and stay aware of tomorrow's trends and opportunities.
Contact Our Team
A few of these talented engineers include:
 
Dan Falla
Senior Technical Service Engineer | Film
Dan has spent more than 30 years in the polymer industry helping customers innovate in new product and application development and is Membership Chair for the Society of Plastics Engineers' Flexible Packaging Division.
 
Carl Baker
Senior Technical Service Engineer | Pressure Pipe
A 35-year veteran in the polymer industry, Carl has worked in technical services, development, troubleshooting, and more. He also holds leadership positions in the Plastic Pipe and Fittings Association, the American Society for Testing and Materials, and the Canadian Standards Association.
 
Francisco Alvarez
Senior Technical Service Engineer | Injection and Blow Molding
Francisco has spent over 25 years in the polymers industry, imparting technical support globally to both converters and PP and PE resin producers. He has also developed new polymer additives and formulations for PP and PE, for which he has received two R&D 100 Awards and several patents.
 
Schedule a call with an account team member today to begin your journey towards an unrivaled customer experience.
Stay In-the-Know
Get the latest news on the PE industry as well as expert tips on removing supply chain obstacles.
Follow Us on LinkedIn
 |  Privacy Policy  |  Terms and Conditions
